Constructors

constructor

  • new MailSender(sender: string, recipient: string, invitation?: string): MailSender
    • Defined in lib-client/asmail/sender.ts:32

    Parameters

    • sender: string

      is a string with sender's mail address, or null, for anonymous sending (non-authenticated).

    • recipient: string

      is a required string with recipient's mail address.

    • Default value invitation: string = null

      is an optional string token, used with either anonymous (non-authenticated) delivery, or in a more strict delivery control in authenticated setting.

    Returns MailSender

authorizeSender

  • authorizeSender(assertionSigner: MailerIdSigner): Promise<void>
    • Defined in lib-client/asmail/sender.ts:197

    This sends mailerId assertion for sender authorization.

    Parameters

    • assertionSigner: MailerIdSigner

      is a MailerId assertion signer

    Returns Promise<void>

    a promise for request completion. Rejected promise passes an error object, conditionally containing status field.

completeDelivery

  • completeDelivery(): Promise<void>
    • Defined in lib-client/asmail/sender.ts:351

    Returns Promise<void>

    a promise, resolvable when message delivery closing.

getRecipientsInitPubKey

  • getRecipientsInitPubKey(): Promise<Reply>
    • Defined in lib-client/asmail/sender.ts:226

    This gets recipients initial public key to launch message exchange.

    Returns Promise<Reply>

    a promise resolvable to certificates, received from server. Certificates are also set in the field of this sender. Rejected promise passes an error object, conditionally containing status field.

performPreFlight

  • performPreFlight(): Promise<Reply>
    • Defined in lib-client/asmail/sender.ts:92

    This performs a pre-flight, server will provide the same information, as in session start, except that non session shall be opened a session.

    Returns Promise<Reply>

    a promise, resolvable to reply info object with maxMsgLength. These values are also set in the fields of this sender. Failed promise's propagated error object may have an error status field: 403 is for not allowing to leave mail, 474 indicates unknown recipient, 480 tells that recipient's mailbox full.

Private sendBytes

  • sendBytes(url: string, bytes: Uint8Array): Promise<void>
    • Defined in lib-client/asmail/sender.ts:285

    Parameters

    • url: string
    • bytes: Uint8Array

    Returns Promise<void>

sendMetadata

  • sendMetadata(meta: Request): Promise<Reply>
    • Defined in lib-client/asmail/sender.ts:250

    This method sends message metadata.

    Parameters

    • meta: Request

    Returns Promise<Reply>

    a promise, resolvable on 201-OK response to json with msgId, and optional min and max limits on object chunks. These values are also set in the fields of this sender. Not-OK responses reject promises.

sendObjHeadChunk

  • sendObjHeadChunk(objId: string, offset: number, chunk: Uint8Array, totalHeadLen?: number): Promise<void>

    Returns Promise<void>

startSession

  • startSession(): Promise<Reply>
    • Defined in lib-client/asmail/sender.ts:145

    This performs the very first, mandatory request to server, telling server who message is intended to, and whether this is an anonymous sender delivery.

    Returns Promise<Reply>

    a promise, resolvable to reply info object with sessionId and maxMsgLength. These values are also set in the fields of this sender. Failed promise's propagated error object may have an error status field: 403 is for not allowing to leave mail, 474 indicates unknown recipient, 480 tells that recipient's mailbox full.
